ygData.msgSnippet: Like a bug on the windshield the little spider went SPLAT when the blast hit it. The ones that made it up the ramp hid in the shadows. (I m rolling a dice to

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Like a bug on the windshield the little spider went SPLAT when the blast hit
it. The ones that made it up the ramp hid in the shadows. (I'm rolling a
dice to see just how many babies are left.) One crawled through an access
panel on the control board, one clung to the bottom of a seat, one stuck
behind the navigations console, and so on.

Thier job was not done yet and they had no design to be stomped out before
it was complete.


----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>

Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 12:14 PM
Subject: Re: Message to Kit Kat


> Famine spotted a small bug on the pod. The base destroyed it may be the
last
> one. He shot a blast at it. Enough to kill it and not damage the hull.
